@brianchoffman This is deeply inaccurate.  DeFi is mostly computer programs (smart contracts) deployed onto a blockchain (mostly Ethereum), where they live forever.  Websites make it easy to use them, but aren’t necessary.  The best DeFi apps like Compound have 10+ novel interfaces.
